title: Pizza Studio
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, Pizza, Italian, Organic, Delivery, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Assembly-line concept pizzeria chain. Choose your base (crusts are vegan except the gluten-free one), sauce, and veggie toppings. Staff then bakes your pizza and delivers it to your table. Has vegan cheese. Has been reported that meat is not in the same area as the veggies.
